RumorFact.Text: Below the Extinct Volcano, there is a cracked sphere with lava rising and falling.

ExploreFact.Text: This core contains structures locked by various buttons. They are very easy to press, not requiring very much pressure to activate, but must all be activated simultaneously.
A dish at the entrance to the core is sending and receiving communications from various structures on the core.
I found a locked structure with a button right outside of it. I don't see a second one, could it have fallen into the lava?
I found a locked structure with two pillars nearby sticking out of the lava.
I found a series of locked structures.

RumorFact.Text: Near the entrance to the lava core exists a very large building. It is not made of metal like the other structures nearby. A barrier prevents entry.

AltText.Text: A shrine can be found a short distance from the entrance to the lava core. A barrier blocks entry, but activating three buttons across the core opens it.

RumorFact.Text: I found a button at the Structure on a Cliff.
I found a button at the Structure by Pillars.
I found a button at the Old Abandoned Town.

ExploreFact.Text: When I entered the shrine, I fell through a fake floor! It turns out that the inhabitants have walls that appear to exist, but are not at all solid. The only way to tell that wall is fake is a symbol on it, which could be <color=FF6E2B>hidden in plain sight</color>.

At the end of the shrine, I found four murals. The first three seem to depict several planets becoming increasingly unstable and falling apart. The fourth depicts a group flying away in a ship, while another group is saddened and angered at being left behind.
